item.title: Machine Learning algorithm on Spark
item.author: yrong@ustc.edu (Ronyang)
item.description: PageRank 算法 The PageRank algorithm outputs a probability distribution used to represent the likelihood that a person randomly clicking on links will arrive at any particular page. Initialize each page’s rank to 1.0. On each iteration, have page p send a contribution of rank(p)/numNeighbors(p) to its neighbors (the pages it has links to). Set each page’s rank to 0.15
